column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Like any world class museum
column2: coming here is a religious experience for any art lover. From the beautiful architecture to the breathtaking touring exhibits
column3: spending time here is magic. Over the years I've also enjoyed the permanent collection immensely. Â Featured are incredible galleries of Ancient
column5: 15th century Spanish and Italian paintings...it just goes on and on. Whether or not you see the touring exhibit you will be blown away.
